meanings.sent1: The turbocharged car zoomed down the road.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic installed a turbocharged engine in the vehicle.
meanings.sent3: The turbocharged computer worked faster than ever before.
meanings.sent4: Her turbocharged enthusiasm for the project was contagious.
meanings.sent5: The turbocharged blender made smoothies in seconds.

meanings.definition: To increase the power or efficiency of something by using a turbocharger
meanings.sent1: The mechanic decided to turbocharge the engine for more speed.
meanings.sent2: They plan to turbocharge the production process to meet the deadline.
meanings.sent3: He turbocharged his morning routine to get to work early.
meanings.sent4: The team turbocharged their efforts to finish the project ahead of schedule.
meanings.sent5: She turbocharged her study sessions to ace the exam.
